title: Is it permissible to make up Sunnah Prayers if one missed it due to oversleeping? | Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: ibrahim from nigeria says if i overslept a prayer can i once i wake up pray it with the sunnah so for example if i missed the prayer and i woke up and i'd like to offer my can i pray the four raka's sunnah before then the fart for raka's then the turak has sunna afterwards the pro the answer is yes there's no problem with that none whatsoever
